inventory module

inventory.add_good()[source]

Add a new good to the inventory.

Returns:

Response from the inventory service after adding the good.

Return type:

flask.Response

inventory.deduct_good()[source]

Deduct stock for a specific good.

Returns:

Response from the inventory service after deducting stock.

Return type:

flask.Response

inventory.update_good()[source]

Update details of a good.

Returns:

Response from the inventory service after updating the good details.

Return type:

flask.Response
